description: For a time on Thursday, President Obama seemed to be playing a mortgage broker on television, urging Americans not to miss out on rock-bottom refinancing rates, Jeff Zeleny writes in a Washington Memo.
title: Obama (as TV Salesman) Pushes Home Refinancing
title_page: Obama (as TV Salesman) Pushes Home Refinancing - The New York Times
text: For a time on Thursday, President Obama seemed to be playing a mortgage broker on television, urging Americans not to miss out on rock-bottom refinancing rates, Jeff Zeleny writes in a Washington Memo.
